title: chat restricted for no real reason!
body:
So ive been leaving a account during the pre season. Im not been toxic at all! Yet with the way the banning or report system is anyone at any time for any reason can report anyone. This is something that really needs to change! I mean if you want to report me for smurfing add that to being reportable.

I love the game but the community really is toxic and just wants to ban anyone!

You were given 3 games of examples in how you are.
ya then u read them its like should ff! I don't know why we arnt ff! Its norms pre 30 just move on! how is any of this toxic?

someone put up a jif of when anakin got his legs lopped off and fell into the lava
